channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: iRobot’s bankruptcy isn’t the end — it’s a reboot, says its CEO
item.description: The news that the maker of the Roomba robot vacuum, iRobot, filed for bankruptcy this week came as no surprise. Its CEO, Gary Cohen, had been warning investors all year that the company could run out of cash unless a buyer was found. When its last potential deal fell through, bankruptcy became inevitable. But Cohen […]

item.title: How Atlas Obscura plans to embrace the 3D web
item.description: This is Lowpass by Janko Roettgers, a newsletter on the ever-evolving intersection of tech and entertainment, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. Atlas Obscura has been crowdsourcing strange and wonderful places from all around the world since its founding in 2009. To date, the site's users and editorial staff have collected and […]...

item.title: TDK Ventures, Accel set to back India’s EtherealX in reusable launch vehicle push: sources
item.description: EtherealX aims to take on SpaceX's Falcon 9 with its fully reusable rocket.

item.title: Alexa+ can now answer your Ring doorbell and talk to people
item.description: Amazon just introduced a new feature for Alexa+ called Greetings. This lets Alexa+ answer the doorbell and converse with visitors, which certainly sounds futuristic in a "gated community as dystopia" kind of way. There are several caveats here. First of all, it only works with certain newer Ring video doorbell models. Customers also have to pony up for a Ring Premium Plan and have access to the Alexa+ early access build. It's available in the US and Canada and only in English. If you meet those criteria, this could be a fairly useful little feature. Amazon says it "transforms your Ring doorbel...

item.title: The Memory Shortage Could End the Era of Physical Games
item.description: Get ready for even more game-key cards on Switch 2.

item.title: OpenAI now accepting ChatGPT app submissions from third-party devs, launches App Directory
item.description: OpenAI has begun accepting submissions from third-party developers for their apps to be accessible directly in ChatGPT, and has launched a new App Directory (don't call it a "store"!) that can be opened from the ChatGPT sidebar and at the URL chatgpt.com/apps.This means the 800 million+ users of OpenAI's hit chatbot can search for, discover and begin using newly approved third-party apps immediately. Once installed, apps can be triggered during conversations by mentioning them by name (using @) or selecting them from the tools menu.The third-party app submission process officially went live la...

item.title: Amazon's Fallout characters are coming to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and Warzone Season 01 Reloaded
item.description: Microsoft has announced a new Fallout crossover that will see the Amazon TV series characters added to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and Warzone.

item.title: Tech provider for NHS England confirms data breach
item.description: U.K.-based healthcare tech provider DXS International said it discovered and contained a data breach on Sunday. A ransomware gang took credit for the breach.

item.title: Having Windows app issues? Microsoft is making businesses reach out directly to get a fix
item.description: The December 2025 Patch Tuesday update broke a few things - and the fix is not yet done.

item.title: Worried about ransomware? IDrive launches new Salesforce Backup tool for greater data protection
item.description: One of our favorite cloud backup providers is launching a new solution for Salesforce safeguarding.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s Health Department Just Pulled Millions in Funding from the American Academy of Pediatrics
item.description: The grants involved research studying autism and sudden infant deaths.

item.title: Thuma Classic Bed Frame Review: Functional Meets Fabulous
item.description: This fashionable favorite bed frame eliminates the need for tools during setup, instead using a Tetris-like stacking process

item.title: Peripheral Labs taps into self-driving car sensors to bring sports fans right into the game
item.description: The startup has raised a $3.6 million seed round led by Khosla Ventures.

item.title: No keynotes, no BS — why this year’s best tech talks happened over cocktails at StrictlyVC
item.description: Impactful talks and connections happen at StrictlyVC. Read the full 2025 recap and join the 2026 waitlist to get access to the lowest ticket prices.

item.title: How to watch Sports Personality of the Year 2025 — stream SPOTY free from anywhere
item.description: With Hannah Hampton, Chloe Kelly, Ellie Kildunne, Luke Littler, Rory McIlroy and Lando Norris on the SPOTY shortlist, here's how to watch Sports Personality of the Year 2025.

item.title: Rivian rolls out new ‘Universal Hands-Free’ driving feature
item.description: The driver assistance software is available on Rivian's for Gen 2 R1 cars and works on 3.5 million miles of North American roads. But it doesn't slow or stop for traffic lights or stop signs.

item.title: La plus grande lune de Saturne n’abriterait pas l’océan attendu, mais quelque chose de peut-être plus prometteur !
item.description: Pendant des années, Titan a été perçue comme un monde abritant un vaste océan d’eau liquide caché sous sa croûte glacée. Mais de nouvelles analyses des données de Cassini bousculent ce scénario bien établi. Et si, au lieu d’un océan global, la plus grande lune de Saturne renfermait une structure...

item.title: Abonnés Starlink de la première heure : surveillez vos emails, un nouveau routeur gratuit vous attend
item.description: SpaceX lance le remplacement gratuit des routeurs Starlink de première génération. L'entreprise informe ses abonnés par email que ces anciens boîtiers ne recevront bientôt plus de mises à jour. En échange, ils recevront le modèle « Mini », plus récent et performant.

item.title: Young Sherlock teaser gives Arthur Conan Doyles detective an explosive origin story
item.description: Who was Arthur Conan Doyle's detective as a youngster? That's what Guy Ritchie's Prime Video series "Young Sherlock" asks.

item.title: La CAF dément toute intrusion, mais confirme une fuite de données
item.description: Une fuite massive frappe la Caisse des Allocations Familiales (CAF). Des pirates ont pu exfiltrer plus de 22 millions de données personnelles. Plus de huit millions de Français seraient touchés. Les hackers du ministère de l'Intérieur sont bien décidés à montrer qu'ils ne plaisantent pas…La CAF dément toute intrusion dans ses système, mais confirme que des données ont été volées....

item.title: Meta Quest 3S slashes price to £249.99! A perfect last-minute Christmas VR gift
item.description: Meta Quest 3S slashes price to £249.99! A perfect last-minute Christmas VR gift

item.title: The Sheep Detectives trailer is shear audacity and Im all in
item.description: Adapted by Craig Mazin ("The Last of Us") and "Minions" director Kyle Balda, "The Sheep Detectives" is a tale of mystery and animalian investigative practices, starring Hugh Jackman.

item.title: ‘Evangelion’ Will Briefly Return Again for a New 30th Anniversary Short Film
item.description: The short animation, written by Hideaki Anno and helmed by 'Thrice Upon A Time' animation director Naoyuki Asano, will debut during a special three-day 'Evangelion' celebration in February 2026.

item.title: Microsoft’s holiday Copilot ad is wrapped in empty promises
item.description: Microsoft is at it again with another round of ads showing people talking to Copilot AI on their computers. This time it's holiday-themed, including a cameo from the big man in red. The 30-second TV spot asks if you're "ready for the holidays" and features actors in various festive home settings asking Copilot for some […]

item.title: This creator-approved mic just reached its lowest price ever — shop at Amazon and save $90
item.description: As of Dec. 18, get the DJI Mic Mini for just $79. That saves you $90 off its list price. Shop now at Amazon.

item.title: 5 things businesses and users should remember when using AI chatbots
item.description: Businesses and users overlook hidden risks in chatbot conversations. These five reminders keep AI use safer.

item.title: Best price ever alert: A 4-pack of Apple AirTags just dropped to under $65
item.description: The Apple AirTag 4-pack is back on sale for $64.98, down from the list price of $99. That's a 34% discount.

item.title: 5 key reasons you should hire a financial planner
item.description: First off, it will give you peace of mind. It might surprise people that my husband and I pay a financial planner, given that I spend a lot of time on financial, tax, and investment planning at work. However, hiring a planner has delivered a return that can’t be quantified: peace of mind.Here are some key reasons we pay for financial advice.1) We wanted a second opinion on a few important decisions.I wanted a different perspective on less-familiar subjects, such as handling employer stock, and whether we needed long-term care insurance. We could have confronted both issues on our own, but havi...

item.title: Micron says memory shortage will ‘persist’ beyond 2026
item.description: Micron, one of the three biggest memory suppliers in the world, forecasts rough months ahead for the global RAM supply. As part of its earnings report released on Wednesday, Micron CEO Sanjay Mehrotra said "tight industry conditions" across DRAM and NAND flash memory are expected to "persist through and beyond" 2026 as AI drives up […]

item.title: Guerre contre les ransomwares : le FBI fait tomber un nouveau maillon clé de l’industrie criminelle
item.description: E-Note, un service de blanchiment de cryptomonnaies au cœur de l’écosystème criminel, vient d’être démantelé par les autorités américaines. Avant de fermer ses portes, il a permis de blanchir plus de 70 millions de dollars issus de cyberattaques.

item.title: Un milliardaire de SpaceX à la tête de la Nasa : la Chine va-t-elle prendre l'avantage ?
item.description: C'est désormais officiel, Jared Isaacman devient bel et bien le nouvel administrateur de la Nasa. Le milliardaire soutenu par Donald Trump avait déjà dévoilé quelques pistes à propos de sa vision de l'agence spatiale américaine.

item.title: Auto giant LKQ says it's the latest firm to be hit by Oracle EBS data breach
item.description: Cl0p claimed to have breached LKQ, but the attack was confirmed only recently.

item.title: DJT stock price rises on surprise news that Truth Social parent Trump Media is merging with TAE Technologies
item.description: According to the announcement, the combined company plans to build fusion power plants to supply energy for the burgeoning AI boom. In a surprising move, Trump Media and Technology Group (DJT) said on Thursday that it is fusing itself to a fusion company.

item.title: The Best Linen Sheets for Cool and Comfy Sleeping (2025)
item.description: Linen might not be your first choice for bedsheets, but it’s got enough benefits that it's worth a try. Here’s the linen we love sleeping on.

item.title: Apple opens up its App Store to competition in Japan
item.description: Epic Games CEO says Fortnite won't return to Japan, though, because the new rules still require high fees.

item.title: ‘All chaos and panic’: Nilay answers your burning Decoder questions
item.description: Welcome to our end-of-year Decoder special! Senior producers Kate Cox and Nick Statt here. We’ve had a big year, including nearly 100 episodes, a new YouTube channel, an ad-free podcast feed, and a slate of great guest hosts while Nilay was on parental leave. It’s been a lot. We’ve also had a lot of great […]

item.title: Meetup's new mobile app is designed to make it easier to meet people IRL
item.description: If you're like me, it's probably been a hot minute since you’ve used or even thought of Meetup. Predating both Facebook and Twitter, the website, which was designed to help people organize in-person events, has changed hands a handful of times in recent years. In 2017, founder Scott Heiferman sold it to WeWork, which offloaded it a few years later before declaring bankruptcy in 2023. As of 2024, Bending Spoons, the Italian tech company that's probably best known for buying Evernote in 2022, has been running Meetup. In the aftermath of the pandemic, the platform has seen something of resurgence...

item.title: Trump Media is merging with fusion power company TAE Technologies in $6B+ deal
item.description: The merger would broaden Trump Media’s holdings into the nascent fusion power space while data centers clamor for more electricity amid the ongoing AI boom.

item.title: Luma releases a new AI model that lets users generate a video from a start and end frame
item.description: Luma AI's new model is available through the company's Dream Machine platform.

item.title: The best laptop deal right now isn’t from Dell or HP - it’s this $430 Intel i9-12900H beast
item.description: Core i9-12900H powered Hasee X5 15.6 laptop is just $429.99 - a massive $370 off its usual price.

item.title: 2026: A year of questions and a question of institutions
item.description: My annual look at the biggest trends of the coming year. Every year since 2010, I’ve posted an article about what trend I expect to dominate the next twelve months. Throughout the 2010s, these forecasts usually focused on emerging technologies or new currents in management thinking. But around 2020, that began to shift. The annual trends increasingly centered on how we cope with change rather than the change itself....
